title:
I tried unsucessfully to contact Coastal Dry Cleaners across from Roses on Carolina Beach Rd.  Left a suit there last month.

Are they in business ?  Can I get my cleaning anywhere? 

Thanks I have relaocated out of the area.
text:
They are still open, but the number is indeed disconnected.

2629 Carolina Beach Rd, Wilmington, NC‎ - (910)
791-7160‎

To get your suit back, we recommend writing them at the address above
or having someone stop in to inquire about it.
